Detailed Description

This class is a slightly improved wxTextCtrl that supports the traditional popup-menu usually provided by text-ctrls.

It provides the following options:

  • Cut
  • Copy
  • Paste
  • Clear
  • Select All

Other than that, it acts exactly like an ordinary wxTextCtrl.

Member Function Documentation

void CMuleTextCtrl::OnPaste ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  )  [protected]

This function takes care of pasting text.

Pleaes note that it is only needed because wxMenu disallows enabling and disabling of items that use the predefined wxID_PASTE id. This is the only one of the already provided commands we need to override, since the others already work just fine.

void CMuleTextCtrl::OnRightDown ( wxMouseEvent &  evt  )  [protected]

This function takes care of creating the popup-menu.

Please note that by using the RIGHT_DOWN event, I'm disabling the second type of selection that the wxTextCtrl supports. However, I frankly only noticed that second selection type while implementing this, so I doubth that anyone will be missing it ...
